dcterms:creator: F. Barahona
dcterms:description: The Ising Problem is a well-known NP-Hard problem that can be reformulated to solve a large class of combinatorial optimization problems by finding the ground state of the system.
dcterms:title: Ising Problem

dcterms:creator: D. H. Ackley
G. E. Hinton
T. J. Sejnowski
dcterms:description: The Boltzmann Machine is a stochastic neural network that serves as a constraint satisfaction network based on the Ising model, used to solve various combinatorial optimization problems.
dcterms:title: Boltzmann Machine

dcterms:creator: S. A. Cook
A. A.
dcterms:description: The 3SAT Boolean Satisfiability Problem is a canonical NP-Hard problem that can be solved using the proposed methods in the paper, demonstrating the representational power of the RBM.
dcterms:title: 3SAT Boolean Satisfiability Problem

dcterms:creator: W. A. Borders
et al.
dcterms:description: The Integer Factorization Problem is a computationally hard problem that is central to modern encryption systems, such as RSA, and is addressed using the proposed RBM methods.
dcterms:title: Integer Factorization Problem
